title: South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission

contentBlocks.excerpt: Reconciliation does not mean forgetting or trying to bury the pain of conflict, but that reconciliation means working together to correct the legacy of past injustice.
contentBlocks.rationale: Emphasizes justice as an active, collaborative process of healing rather than punishment.
contentBlocks.notes: Serves as a model for post-conflict ethics in global transitional justice work.
